justification: Tatum has averaged 29.8 PPG over his last 5 games and faces a defense that allows the 4th most points to SFs.
Denver plays at a slower pace vs top assist-suppressing team; Jokic has gone under in 4 of last 5.
Curry has hit 5+ threes in 6 of his last 7 games against the Lakers.
Giannis is averaging 12.2 RPG in his last 5, and the opposing team ranks bottom 3 in defensive rebounding.
LeBron has stayed under 3.5 turnovers in 8 of his last 10 games.
